      • run

        public static Matrix run(Matrix X,
         int K,
         int r)
        Isomap (isometric feature mapping).
        Parameters:
        X - an n x d data matrix with each row being a feature vector
        K - number of nearest neighbors
        r - number of dimensions to be reduced to
        Returns:
        an n x r matrix which is the r dimensional representation of the given n data examples
